languages.text: The Arch-Militant gains a +<u>(5 + number of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. This bonus is kept when the Arch-Militant uses {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} or {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Confident Approach{/g}.
languages.original_text: Архмилитант получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +(5 + число уровней эффекта "универсальность")% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g}. Этот бонус сохраняется при использовании Осторожного подхода или Решительного подхода.

traits.locale_text: The Veteran gains a +5% bonus to critical damage for every stack of Right Tool for the Job. This bonus is kept when the Veteran uses Cautious Approach or Confident Approach.
The Veteran gains a +5% bonus to critical damage for every stack of right tool for the job. This bonus is kept when the Veteran uses Cautious Approach or Confident Approach.

The Arch-Militant gains a +(5 + number of versatility stacks)% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. This bonus is kept when the Arch-Militant uses Cautious Approach or Confident Approach.

The Arch-Militant gains a +(5 + number of stacks of versatility)% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. This bonus is kept when the Arch-Militant uses Cautious Approach or Confident Approach.

languages.text: 首席战士的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高<u>（5+{g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}“多才多艺“{/g}层数）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}。即便首席战士使用{g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}步步为营{/g}或{g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}激流勇进{/g}之后，此加成效果也依然保留。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains a +<u>(5 + number of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. traits.locale_text: 首席战士的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高（5+“多才多艺”层数）%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}。即便首席战士使用步步为营或激流勇进之后，此加成效果也依然保留。

languages.text: El Archimilitante gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +<u>(5 + acumulaciones de {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatilidad{/g})</u> % al {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}. traits.locale_text: El Archimilitante gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +(5 + acumulaciones de Versatilidad) % al {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}. Esta bonificación se conserva aunque el Archimilitante use Enfoque cauteloso o Enfoque confiado.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントの{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}に+3(5 + 汎用性のスタック)%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が付与される。このボーナスはアーク・ミリタントが警戒接近または積極的接近を使用する際も維持される。

traits.locale_text: Архмилитант получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>(5 + число уровней эффекта {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}универсальность{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g}. Ветеран получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g} за каждый уровень "подходящего способа". Этот бонус сохраняется при использовании Осторожного подхода или Решительного подхода.

languages.text: Der Erzmilitant erhält für jeden Stapel {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Vielseitigkeit{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +3 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g}. Dieser Bonus wird beibehalten, wenn der Erzmilitant {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Vorsichtiges Vorgehen{/g} oder {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Selbstbewusstes Vorgehen{/g} nutzt.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains a +<u>(5 + number of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} stacks)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. This bonus is kept when the Arch-Militant uses {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} or {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Confident Approach{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Erzmilitant erhält für jeden Stapel von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +3 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g}. Dieser Bonus wird beibehalten, wenn der Erzmilitant Vorsichtiges Vorgehen oder Selbstbewusstes Vorgehen nutzt.

languages.text: L'archimilitant obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +<u>(5 + nombre de cumuls de {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Polyvalence{/g})</u> % aux {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}. Il conserve ce bonus lorsqu'il utilise {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Approche prudente{/g} ou {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Approche confiante{/g} .

traits.locale_text: L'archimilitant obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +(5 + nombre de cumuls de Polyvalence) % aux {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}. Il conserve ce bonus lorsqu'il utilise Approche prudente ou Approche confiante.

L'archimilitant obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +(5 + nombre de cumuls de Polyvalence) % aux {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}. Il conserve ce bonus lorsqu'il utilise Approche prudente ou Approche confiante.

languages.text: Başmilitan, vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasara{/g} +%<u>(5 + {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}çok yönlülük{/g} birikimi sayısı)</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır. Bu bonus, Başmilitan {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Temkinli Yaklaşım{/g} veya {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Öz Güvenli Yaklaşım{/g} kullandığında da korunur.
